formatted_address: Junction off Jalan Boon Lay & Boon Lay Way, Singapore 609961
name: Jurong Central Park

reviews.text:
Weekend Wanders: Jurong Central Park
Took a stroll through Jurong Central Park over the weekend â€” a peaceful green escape nestled just minutes away from Jurong Point and Boon Lay MRT.

Though itâ€™s not as expansive as Jurong Lake Gardens, the park offers a refreshing and lush environment thatâ€™s perfect for unwinding after a hearty lunch or shopping spree at the mall. With its open lawns, shaded walking paths, and the gentle rustling of trees, itâ€™s a wonderful spot to just pause and breathe.

If youâ€™re around Jurong and need a short nature break, this park is definitely worth a visit. Sometimes, itâ€™s the smaller green spaces that offer the biggest reset.

ğŸ›There is a regular sand-filled Playground with slides, see-saw, car ride, carousel, balance beam and more for smaller children.
ğŸ§¢This spacious green lung is well shaded with jogging paths winding around the entire serene Park.
ğŸª»Over at the southern end of the lush Park is a Water Lily Pond with an abundance of lovely water lilies and other aquatic plants.
ğŸ›ğŸğŸŒºğŸŒ½Allotment Garden, Community-in-Bloom Garden and Boon Lay Nature Garden, allow gardening enthusiasts to grow herbs, vegetables and ornamental plants.
ğŸ‹ï¸A recently upgraded Fitness Corner located located across the Water Lily Garden, let joggers warm up and have some muscle toning and strength training in between the regular jogging.
ğŸ›´ğŸš²The Park is well connected to various Park Connectors.
ğŸšŠIt's conveniently located right at the doorstep of Boon Lay MRT.
ğŸŒ³Jurong Central Park is a conveniently located green lung with regular Park amenities for all to enjoy.

The park is steeped in history and local knowledge about plants if you know who to look for. Overall also easily 3 degree Celsius cooler.

I spotted a local water hen having a blast and thought it's cute

Jurong Central Park is a well-maintained, family-friendly park in Singapore, featuring creative play areas for children and ample space for walking, running, and jogging.

Some visitors have noted its location in the western part of the island, which may be less convenient for travelers staying in other areas.

Overall, the park is appreciated for its clean environment and suitability for various outdoor activities.
The atmosphere is peaceful and shady, suitable for exercising and relaxing. Convenient transportation, near the train station

vicinity: Junction off Jalan Boon Lay & Boon Lay Way
